message: Hi there
Hello, how can I help you today?
Yeah hi, I need to get a replacement V5C logbook for my car as I've lost the original.
Okay, no problem. I can assist you with that.
But I'm not sure if I have all the right information and documents.
That's alright, we can go through what you need. Do you have the vehicle registration number?
Uh yeah it's BA51 SMR
Got it, BA51 SMR.
And what's the make and model of the vehicle?
It's a Ford Fiesta, 2012 model
Okay great.
Do you have any documentation with the vehicle details like an old tax reminder or insurance documents?
Uh no not really, I've just moved house as well so everything's a bit uppy downy
No worries, we can still proceed without those.
Could you confirm your full name and current address for me please?
Yeah it's John Michael Smith, oh uhh hang on let me get the right address...
12 Acacia Avenue, Bristol, BS5 7ER. No wait, that's the old one!
It's 27 Elm Road, Bristol, BS9 2QA now
No problem, I've got 27 Elm Road, Bristol, BS9 2QA
Okay great, and just to confirm the full registration is BA51 SMR?
No no, sorry let me start again. The reg is BA51 SRM
SRM not SMR
Got it, BA51 SRM. My apologies for the confusion earlier.
To get a replacement V5C logbook there is a fee of £25. How would you like to pay for that?
Oh blimey £25? That's a bit steep innit, just for a new logbook?
I understand it may seem high but that is the standard fee set by DVLA to replace a lost or damaged V5C document.
Hmm ok then I suppose I'll have to pay it
We can take payment by debit or credit card over the phone if that's convenient?
Yeah go on then, I'll pay by card
Sure, I'll take those details now...
Just one sec... got me wallet here somewhere
No rush, I'll wait while you get your card ready.
Right here we go, it's a Visa debit, number 4512 7890 1234 5678
An expiry date is 03/26
Ok got those details. And can you provide the 3 digit security code from the back please?
Great, let me process that payment for £25 now.
Ok mate
Payment approved, thank you.
You should receive your replacement V5C logbook within 2 weeks.
Right ok
An' that's it then is it?
Yes, that's everything from my end.
Please let me know if you need anything else.
Nah you're alright, cheers for your help
You're very welcome. Goodbye!
Bye!
